abstract: Kicking off Tulane University’s annual Corporate Law Institute for mergers lawyers, JPMorgan Chase’s Douglas Braunstein says that the signs are present for renewed deal-making in 2010.
snippet: Kicking off Tulane University’s annual Corporate Law Institute for mergers lawyers, JPMorgan Chase’s Douglas Braunstein says that the signs are present for renewed deal-making in 2010.
lead_paragraph: NEW ORLEANS — The recovery in deal-making may appear slow, but in the view of Douglas L. Braunstein, JPMorgan Chase‘s head of investment banking, it is real.

headline.main: Tulane: JPMorgan’s Braunstein Sees Good Signs Ahead

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
